burlap.oomdp.singleagent.explorer

Class StateResetSpecialAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.oomdp.singleagent.explorer.StateResetSpecialAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpecialExplorerAction

    public class StateResetSpecialAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpecialExplorerAction
    A special non-domain action that causes a visual explorer to rest the state to a specified base state or to a state drawn from a state generator.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan
